text:
Q: Thymeleaf email image not displayed A:

I answer my own question because I've suceeded to resolve the problem :

Just add the image like that <img src="cid:imageName"/> in the html file

Q: Prompt Engineering A:

You appear to be trying to interact with an LLM, rather than with this community. Try here: https://stackoverflow.com/ai-assist

Q: Bulk insert .json data into SSMS(Sql server management studio) A:

When uploading the JSON file from a PC running Server Studio you must provide the full network path of the PC. The SQL server needs to be on the same network as well. Additionally the location on your local disk need to be set up as shared. From you above example:

\\HindolsPC\Users\Hindol\Downloads\Loan.json

Where HindolsPC should be the actual name of your PC on the network and Downloads needs to be shared. You will probably want to choose another dedicated folder for this activity.
